TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract beforefieldinit DiagnosticSource extends System.Object

summary.span: 一个抽象类，它允许针对丰富数据有效负载的生产时日志记录检测代码，以在被检测的进程中使用。

span.span: An abstract class that allows code to be instrumented for production-time logging of rich data payloads for consumption within the process that was instrumented.

remarks.span: 有关详细信息, 请参阅[DiagnosticSource 用户指南](https://github.com/dotnet/corefx/blob/master/src/System.Diagnostics.DiagnosticSource/src/DiagnosticSourceUsersGuide.md)。

span.span: For more information, see [DiagnosticSource User's Guide](https://github.com/dotnet/corefx/blob/master/src/System.Diagnostics.DiagnosticSource/src/DiagnosticSourceUsersGuide.md).

summary.span: 验证通知事件是否已启用。

span.span: Verifies if the notification event is enabled.

returns.span: 如果通知事件已启用，为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the notification event is enabled, otherwise.

remarks.format: 如果有大量的通知设置, 可以在执行此设置之前调用 IsEnabled。If there is expensive setup for the notification, you can call IsEnabled before performing this setup. 使用者不应假定他们仅获取 IsEnabled 为 true 的通知。Consumers should not assume that they only get notifications for which IsEnabled is true. 不过, 对于创建者调用此 API, 它是可选的。However, it is optional for producers to call this API. 该名称应与传递给的名称相同。The name should be the same as that passed to .

remarks.format: 如果有大量的通知设置, 可以在执行安装程序之前调用此方法并提供上下文。If there is expensive setup for the notification, you can call this method and provide context before performing the setup.

MemberSignature.Value: public virtual void OnActivityExport (System.Diagnostics.Activity activity, object payload);
.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void OnActivityExport(class System.Diagnostics.Activity activity, object payload) cil managed
public: virtual void OnActivityExport(System::Diagnostics::Activity ^ activity, System::Object ^ payload);
abstract member OnActivityExport : System.Diagnostics.Activity * obj -> unit override this.OnActivityExport : System.Diagnostics.Activity * obj -> unit

summary.span: 将状态从活动转移到将在进程外发生的某些事件或操作，例如传出 HTTP 请求。

span.span: Transfers state from an activity to some event or operation, such as an outgoing HTTP request, that will occur outside the process.

remarks.format: 如果 instumentation 站点位于活动离开进程的位置 (例如传出 HTTP 请求), 则该站点将需要将状态从活动传输到传出请求。If an instumentation site is at a location where activities leave the process (such as outgoing HTTP requests), that site will want to transfer state from the activity to the outgoing request. 在可能的情况下, 此操作应由检测站点完成, 因为在检测站点的和 ougoing 请求逻辑之间存在协定。To the extent possible, this should be done by the instrumenation site, because there is a contract between an and the ougoing request logic at the instrumentation site. 但是, 检测站点无法处理策略 (例如, 出于兼容性原因, 是否应禁用或以较旧的格式编写活动信息)。However, the instrumenation site can't handle policy (for example, whether activity information should be disabled or written in an older format for compatibility reasons). 为此, 检测站点需要回调到日志记录系统, 并要求它解析策略。For this, the instrumentation site needs to call back out to the logging system and ask it to resolve policy. 这是`OnActivityExport`方法的用途。This is the purpose of the `OnActivityExport` method. 为方法提供了和表示传出请求的负载对象。 `OnActivityExport`The `OnActivityExport` method is given the as well as a payload object that represents the outgoing request. 然后 , 订阅服务器能够在发送传出请求之前对其进行更新。A subscriber then has the ability to update the outgoing request before it is sent. 请注意, 此方法很少用在检测站点 (只有位于进程传出边界的站点)。Note that this method is rarely used at instrumentation sites (only those sites that are on an outgoing boundary of the process). 而且, 通常情况下, 检测站点执行的默认策略 (例如, 传输特定传出约定中的所有活动状态) 可能会很好。Moreover, typically the default policy that the instrumenation site performs (for example, to transfer all activity state in a particular outgoing convention) is likely to be fine. 此方法仅适用于这是问题的情况。This method is only for cases where that is a problem. 因此, 应该很少使用此方法, 并且在这里, 我们的 symetry `OnActivityImport`和未来的校对。Thus, this method should be used very rarely and is mostly here for symetry with `OnActivityImport` and future-proofing. 请注意, 在此处键入为, 但任何特定检测站点和订阅服务器应该知道有效负载的类型, 因此在必要时对其进行强制转换和解码。 `payload`Note that `payload` is typed as an here, but any particular instrumentation site and subscriber should know the type of the payload and thus cast and decode it if necessary.

MemberSignature.Value: public virtual void OnActivityImport (System.Diagnostics.Activity activity, object payload);
.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void OnActivityImport(class System.Diagnostics.Activity activity, object payload) cil managed
public: virtual void OnActivityImport(System::Diagnostics::Activity ^ activity, System::Object ^ payload);
abstract member OnActivityImport : System.Diagnostics.Activity * obj -> unit override this.OnActivityImport : System.Diagnostics.Activity * obj -> unit

param.name: activity
param.span: 受外部事件影响的活动。

span.span: The activity affected by an external event.

param.name: payload
param.span: 表示传入请求的有效负载。

span.span: A payload that represents the incoming request.

summary.span: 将状态从将在进程外发生的某些事件或操作（例如传入请求）转移到活动。

span.span: Transfers state to an activity from some event or operation, such as an incoming request, that occurred outside the process.

remarks.format: 如果 instumentation 站点创建新活动以响应进程外的某个事件 (例如传入 HTTP 请求), 则`OnActivityImport`方法允许该站点创建新的活动, 并将传入请求的状态传输到活动.If an instumentation site creates a new activity in response to some event outside the process, such as an incomming HTTP request), the `OnActivityImport` method allows that site will want to create a new activity and transfer state from the incoming request to the activity. 在可能的情况下, 应通过检测站点来完成此操作, 因为在检测站点的和传入请求逻辑之间存在一个约定。To the extent possible, this should be done by the instrumentation site, because there is a contract between the and the incomming request logic at the instrumentation site. 不过, 检测站点无法处理策略。However, the instrumentation site can't handle policy. (例如, 如果执行了采样, 应确切地采样哪些请求？)在这些情况下, 检测站点需要回调到日志记录系统, 并要求其解决策略 (例如, 决定是否应设置活动的 "采样" 位)。(For example, if sampling is done, exactly which requests should be sampled?) In these cases, the instrumentation site needs to call back out to the logging system and ask it to resolve policy (for example, to decide if the activity's "sampling" bit should be set). 这是`OnActivityImport`方法的用途。This is the purpose of the `OnActivityImport` method. 向其提供活动以及表示传入请求的负载对象。It is given the activity as well as a payload object that represents the incomming request. 然后, 订阅者可以根据需要更新此活动。The subscribers to the then have the opportunity to update this activity as desired. 此方法很少用于检测站点 (仅限位于进程边界的站点), instrumetation 站点实现某些默认策略 (它以*某种*方式设置活动), 因此, 不需要重写此方法 (如果此默认策略是正确的。This method is rarely used at instrumentation sites (only those sites that are on the boundary of the process), and the instrumetation site implements some default policy (it sets the activity in *some* way), and so it is not necessary to override this method if that default policy is fine. 换句话说, 此方法应在非常罕见 (但通常很重要) 的情况下重写。In other words, this method should be overridden in very rare (but often important) cases. 请注意, 在此处键入, 但任何特定检测站点和订阅服务器都将知道有效负载的类型, 因此在必要时对其进行强制转换和解码。 `payload`Note that `payload` is typed as here, but any particular instrumentation site and subscriber will know the type of the payload and thus cast and decode it if necessary.

span.span: The to be started.

span.span: An object that represent the value being passed as a payload for the event.

summary.span: 启动 并写入启动事件。

span.span: Starts an and writes a start event.

returns.span: 便于链接的已启动的活动。

span.span: The started activity for convenient chaining.

remarks.format: 描述逻辑操作、其上下文和父关系, 当前在处理操作过程中流动。 The describes the logical operation, its context, and parent relation; the current flows through the operation processing. 此方法启动给定的, 维护给定的全局和活动, 并通知使用者已开始新的。This method starts the given , maintains a global and activity for the given , and notifies consumers that a new was started. 使用者可以访问添加上下文和/或增加遥测数据。Consumers can access to add context and/or augment telemetry. 创建者可以向有效负载中的使用者传递其他详细信息。Producers may pass additional details to the consumer in the payload.

span.span: Stops the given , maintains the global activity, and notifies consumers that the was stopped.

remarks.format: 创建者可以向有效负载中的使用者传递其他详细信息。Producers may pass additional details to the consumer in the payload. 使用者可以访问添加上下文和/或增加遥测数据。Consumers can access to add context and/or augment telemetry.

MemberSignature.Value: public abstract void Write (string name, object value);
.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void Write(string name, object value) cil managed
Public MustOverride Sub Write (name As String, value As Object)
public: abstract void Write(System::String ^ name, System::Object ^ value);
abstract member Write : string * obj -> unit

param.name: name
param.span: 正在写入的事件的名称。

span.span: The name of the event being written.

param.name: value
param.span: 一个对象，它表示作为事件的有效负载传递的值。

span.span: An object that represents the value being passed as a payload for the event.

param.span: 这通常是一个包含多个子值的匿名类型。

span.span: This is often an anonymous type which contains several sub-values.

summary.span: 提供记录复杂有效负载的通用方法。

span.span: Provides a generic way of logging complex payloads.

remarks.format: 为每个通知提供一个标识它的名称, 以及一个对象 (通常为匿名类型), 该对象提供要传递给通知的任意信息。Each notification is given a name that identifies it, as well as an object (typically an anonymous type) that provides arbitrary information to pass to the notification. `name`应为 short。`name` should be short. 不要使用完全限定的名称, `name`除非必须是全局唯一的。Don't use a fully qualified name unless you have to to avoid ambiguity, since `name` must be globally unique. 通常, *componentName*(其中*ComponentName*和*事件名称*是小于10个字符的字符串) 是一个很好的折衷。Typically, *componentName.eventName*, where *componentName* and *eventName* are strings less than 10 characters, are a good compromise. 通知名称不应包含`.`在其中, 因为组件名称具有点, 并且它们都具有点来导致歧义。Notification names should not have `.` in them because component names have dots, and for them both to have dots leads to ambiguity. `_`建议改用。We suggest that you use `_` instead. 假定侦听器将使用字符串前缀来筛选组。Assume that listeners will use string prefixing to filter groups. 因此, 具有组件名称的层次结构是一种很好的做法。Therefore, having a hierarchy of component names is a good practice.
